doc.field: Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Series XVII. Peace Corps Volunteer Publications
Series XVII. Peace Corps Volunteer Publications

.5 linear feet (1 box), arranged chronologically. This series contains newsletters organized by or published for Peace Corps volunteers. The newsletters provide details of various Peace Corps projects, including the activities of graduates from the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program.
